question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please read every question and indicate how much you agree or disagree.
0 = Strongly disagree, 1 = Disagree, 2 = Neither agree nor disagree, 3 = Agree, 4 = Strongly agree
I feel out of control in the presence of delicious food.
When I start eating, I just can't seem to stop.
It is difficult for me to leave food on my plate.
When it comes to foods I love, I have no willpower.
I get so hungry that my stomach often seems like a bottomless pit.
0 = Strongly disagree, 1 = Disagree, 2 = Neither agree nor disagree, 3 = Agree, 4 = Strongly agree
It seems like most of my waking hours are preoccupied by thoughts about eating or not eating.
I have days when I can't seem to think about anything else but food.
Food is always on my mind.
I feel hungry all the time.
I can't stop thinking about eating no matter how hard I try.
I find myself continuing to consume certain foods even though I am no longer hungry.
If food tastes good to me, I eat more than usual.
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
